overview: When a mysterious accident involving her best friend occurs, 16-year-old Hailey Greene bends the truth in order to protect her upper-middle-class familyâ€™s reputation. As the situation grows more dire, Hailey finds herself at the intersection of truth and loyalty, and must decide before fate chooses for her.
